00010 
00011 namespace media {
00012 class MediaSyncEventProxy;
00013 
00014 class MediaSyncEvent {
00015   public:
00016       enum SyncEvent {
00017           //No sync event specified.
00018           SYNC_EVENT_NONE = 0,
00019           //The corresponding action is triggered only when the presentation is completed
00020           //(meaning the media has been presented to the user) on the specified session.
00021           SYNC_EVENT_PRESENTATION_COMPLETE
00022       };
00023 
00024       explicit MediaSyncEvent(SyncEvent eventType);
00025 
00026       virtual ~MediaSyncEvent();
00027 
00028       //Sets the event source audio session ID.
00029       //The audio session ID specifies on which audio session the synchronization event should be monitored.
00030       //It is mandatory for certain event types (e.g. SYNC_EVENT_PRESENTATION_COMPLETE).
00031       void setAudioSessionId(int32_t audioSessionId);
00032 
00033       //Gets the synchronization event type.
00034       SyncEvent getType();
00035 
00036       //Gets the synchronization event audio session ID.
00037       int32_t getAudioSessionId();
00038 
00040       GAIA_LOCAL MediaSyncEventProxy* getProxy() const;
00043   private:
00045       MediaSyncEventProxy* mpMediaSyncEventProxy;
00047     DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(MediaSyncEvent);
00048 };  // class MediaSyncEvent
